extension.description: RHelper Class: The system plugin loads the rImage classes Joomla-wide. You can also add the parameter &rimage=regen in the admin area to regenerate all images.

field.name: showregen
field.label: Show regenerate button
field.description: Show a button in K2 item edit view to regenerate images.

field.name: showorder
field.label: Enable gallery ordering
field.description: Enable a popup to reorder a gallery.
